content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you, Juan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. Based on my research, I believe a rental price of 700 Euros per month would be fair. This takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Mannheim. What are your thoughts on this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. Thank you.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Great to hear that, Juan. I am glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. I look forward to welcoming you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have one question. Is it possible to move in on the 1st of July?

Thank you.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Yes, it is possible to move in on the 1st of July. However, I would need to confirm with my property management team to ensure that the apartment is available and ready for occupancy on that date. If everything is in order, we can proceed with the move-in process and sign the lease agreement. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
